$jsonSchema.title: Leaderboard Schema Validator
$jsonSchema.description: Leaderboard of submissions. Caching the related objects to avoid re-querying each time.

rank.description: (unique index) 'rank' must be an int and is required. This should be unique and enforced in the collection constructor, not here.

user.description: 'user' is required. This must be a 'users' type (type assertation should be inherited and not enforced here)

submission.description: 'submission' is required. This must be a 'submissions' type (type assertation should be inherited and not enforced here)
